channel.title: ballboy - The Podcasts
channel.itunes:author: Gordon McIntyre
channel.description: Podcasts made by Gordon ballboy and his acoustic guitar. The podcast is a regular feature and one will be made every 2-3 weeks or so. The format at the moment is that gordon will talk a little, sing a new song, talk a little and sing an old song.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Songs from Edinburgh based band ballboy.
channel.itunes:summary: Gordon ballboy and his acoustic guitar. This is a regular feature of one podcast every 2-3 weeks or so. The format at the moment is that gordon will talk a little, sing a new song, talk a little and sing an old song.

item.title: ballboy - the first podcast
item.itunes:author: Gordon McIntyre
item.description: the first ever ballboy podcast, featuring acoustic versions of the song sunday league and i don't have time to stand here with you fighting about the size of my dick
item.itunes:subtitle: the first ever ballboy podcast, featuring acoustic versions of the song sunday league and i don't have time to stand here with you fighting about the size of my dick
item.itunes:summary: the first ever ballboy podcast, featuring acoustic versions of the song sunday league and i don't have time to stand here with you fighting about the size of my dick
item.author: ballboy@ballboymusic.com

item.title: ballboy - the second podcast
item.itunes:author: Gordon McIntyre
item.description: the second ever ballboy podcast, featuring acoustic versions of Godzilla Vs The Island of Manhattan with you and I somewhere inbetween" & "One sailor was waving".
item.itunes:subtitle: the second ever ballboy podcast, featuring acoustic versions of "Godzilla Vs The Island of Manhattan with you and I somewhere inbetween" and "One sailor was waving".
item.itunes:summary: the second ever ballboy podcast, featuring acoustic versions of "Godzilla Vs The Island of Manhattan with you and I somewhere inbetween" and "One sailor was waving".
item.author: ballboy@ballboymusic.com

item.title: ballboy - the third podcast
item.itunes:author: Gordon McIntyre
item.description: the third ever ballboy podcast, featuring acoustic versions of "If my hangover was a girl" and "Leave the earth behind and take a walk into the sunshine".
item.itunes:subtitle: the third ever ballboy podcast, featuring acoustic versions of "If my hangover was a girl" and "Leave the earth behind and take a walk into the sunshine"
item.itunes:summary: the third ever ballboy podcast, featuring acoustic versions of "If my hangover was a girl" and "Leave the earth behind and take a walk into the sunshine".
item.author: ballboy@ballboymusic.com

item.title: ballboy - the forth podcast
item.itunes:author: Gordon McIntyre
item.description: the 4th ever podcast by ballboy 26th November 2006, featuring acoustic versions of "A Famous Victory" and "Shallow Footprints in the Snow".
item.itunes:subtitle: the 4th ever podcast by ballboy 26th November 2006, featuring acoustic versions of "A Famous Victory" and "Shallow Footprints in the Snow".
item.itunes:summary: the 4th ever podcast by ballboy 26th November 2006, featuring acoustic versions of "A Famous Victory" and "Shallow Footprints in the Snow"
item.author: ballboy@ballboymusic.com

item.title: ballboy - the fifth podcast
item.itunes:author: Gordon McIntyre
item.description: the final ballboy podcast of 2006, featuring acoustic versions of "I need two hearts", "Disney's Ice Parade" and "Lucky Moments" by "Bobby Baby".
item.itunes:subtitle: the final ballboy podcast of 2006, featuring acoustic versions of "I need two hearts", "Disney's Ice Parade" and "Lucky Moments" by "Bobby Baby".
item.itunes:summary: the final ballboy podcast of 2006, featuring acoustic versions of "I need two hearts", "Disney's Ice Parade" and "Lucky Moments" by "Bobby Baby".
item.author: ballboy@ballboymusic.com

item.title: ballboy - the sixth podcast
item.itunes:author: Gordon McIntyre
item.description: the first ballboy podcast of 2007, featuring acoustic versions of "Absent Friends" , "The Ghosts of New Orleans", as well as songs by Idiot Love, ++Money Can't Buy Music and Park Avenue Music.
item.itunes:subtitle: the first ballboy podcast of 2007, featuring acoustic versions of "Absent Friends" , "The Ghosts of New Orleans", as well as songs by Idiot Love, ++Money Can't Buy Music and Park Avenue Music.
